dmca.title: Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
To Hildegard Savage
2002 W Camelback Rd #375

Phoenix AZ 85716


It has come to our attention that you have violated the DMCA (Digital Millennium Copyright Act) with your website located at www.shopcreativepresents.com.



This is an identical copy of the website located at www.shopcreativegifts.com and owned by Creative Gifts to Go LLC, 1911 E Rainier Loop, Flagstaff, AZ 86004, with the exception of inserting your phone number and Phoenix as the business location. 



I have copied your website html and have it on file as proof of the copyright infringement.  I am the copyright owner of this website and have proof that it has been online since January 2000. You have not been given permission to copy any portion of this website.



If it is not removed within 24 hours  from 11/23/2007 at 9:35 p.m. MST, further legal action will be taken against you and your hosting company.



Joyce Reid

Owner - Creative Gifts To Go LLC

1911 E Rainier Loop

Flagstaff, AZ 86004

www.shopcreativegifts.com
